name: Authenticating Gaze
components: V, S, DF/M (a miniature magnifying glass or spectacles)
text: Your understanding of the written word becomes analytical and discerning. You gain an insight bonus equal to your caster level (maximum +10) on Appraise checks to determine the value of books and scrolls and on Linguistics checks to detect forgeries, and you can attempt a Linguistics check to detect a forged document at a glance, rather than taking the normal 1 round of examination per page. In addition, you immediately detect whether written works within 30 feet and within your line of sight have a magical aura and the strength of any such auras, as though you had concentrated on each written work for 1 round using detect magic.
components_zh: 语言、姿势、法器/材料 (一个微型放大镜或眼镜)
text_zh: 你对于书写文字的理解更加擅长与敏锐。你在评估书本与卷轴价值的估价检定，以及辨认伪造的语言学检定上，获得等同你施法者等级(最大为+10)的内在加值，只需你一瞥，就可以尝试检定辨认伪造的语言学检定，而非正常的每页1轮来检查。此外，你可以立即检测位于你30尺内或是在你视线范围内的书写文字，你可以看出是否有魔法灵光以及任何种类灵光的强度，就好像你使用侦测魔法专注于每一个书写文字上1轮一样。
